page.title: 12SEBRIGHT OF WOLVERLEY
page.content: {William Sebright}was born in 1541. He went to{London}and by buying property soon became very rich. He did not forget his native village however and in .... he made an{endowment}for the poor.This involved providing bread ,clothing and money for the needy of the area. He also wished to provide for a {Grammar School}and this was eventually opened in .... The endowment also provided for elementary education and the present {Primary school}was built in 1926 with the help of Sebright Trust funds. The Grammar School later became a {Public School}and is now a{High {School }maintained by the L.E.A. The{Sebright Educational {Foundation}now provides funds for the benefit of local education.
